                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This file contains all notable changes to vuepress-theme-hope and its plugins.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 2.0.0-beta.147open in new window (2022-12-31)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • add auto catalog plugin and Catalog component (#2339open in new window) (d651a89open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • components: update icon (edfb097open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • improve code block print style (d4b6b12open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • md-enhance: use @mdit/plugin-tab (f86b34aopen in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • pwa2: improve print style (7d2a5f5open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • theme: hide empty icon with no category selected, close #2598open in new window (219e82bopen in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Bug Fixes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • components: correct icon asset link (ed684b1open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Before:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  :::: code-group

::: code-group-item pnpm

```bash
pnpm create vuepress-theme-hope@next [dir]
```

:::

::: code-group-item npm:active

```bash
npm init vuepress-theme-hope@next [dir]
```

:::

::::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  After:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ::: code-tabs

@tab pnpm

```bash
pnpm create vuepress-theme-hope@next [dir]
```

@tab:active npm

```bash
npm init vuepress-theme-hope@next [dir]
```

:::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  This change avoids nesting containers and makes it easier to read and write.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Features

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • components: add Tab component (07909b4open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • md-enhance: add container (a8e60c0open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • md-enhance: rebuild codegroup (63d0973open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Bug Fixes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • components: fix Tab style on mobile (6b95837open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 2.0.0-beta.64open in new window (2022-05-19)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • components: add CodePen and PDF component (1e4ebf7open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • theme: fix globalEncrypt (1401242open in new window)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • theme: fix logoDark (1df15f0open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Breaking Changes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                To support pnpm, you should apply vuepress-theme-hope using new syntax:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                - import { defineHopeConfig } from "vuepress-theme-hope";
+ import { defineUserConfig } from "vuepress";
+ import { hopeTheme } from "vuepress-theme-hope";

- export default defineHopeConfig({
-   themeConfig: {
-     // hope theme config
-   },
+ export default defineUserConfig({
+   theme: hopeTheme({
+     // hope theme config
+   })
    // other config
  });

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Besides providing hopeTheme, all defineXXXConfig exports are removed, vuepress-theme-hope now provides these new exports:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • navbar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • sidebar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • arraySidebar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • objectSidebar

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Since vuepress drop support for the babel way, search and docsearch options in themeConfig.plugins are removed. You need to install and call the plugins via plugins option in config file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 2.0.0-beta.47open in new window (2022-04-24)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • improve Russian localization (#1706open in new window) (427bc47open in new window)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # 2.0.0-alpha.1open in new window (2021-06-09)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                # Bug Fixes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • md-enhance: style fixes (e7f8847open in new window)
